column4: so i just installed the nvidia restricted drivers, and now xorg is hosed, it wont even start. can anyone tell me how to revert to a working xconfig?
there is no Nvidia device, because i ran a dpkg-reconfigure on xserver-xorg to try to fix it
startx tells me no screens found...
nothing happens, init 5 just returns to the shell
lol init 5 stopped my keyboard from working on the other virtual terminals
so what do i do after removing the xconfig?
Have you removed it? If so I'd try a reboot, xorg might be recreated.
alrighty ill try that, and i might brb ;-)
If not, we'll try some more troubleshooting =)
so that didnt work, but i can tell that the nvidia-xconfig ALMOST makes X work. but X says it cant find any devices
you know anything about AllowEmptyInput in xconfig?
